DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test accuracy two device ( Kai Spot ( v 2.1 ) Kai Continuous ( v 1.0 ) measure breathe patter ( fast breath ) without wire without touch body .
DOC.brief_title: Substantial Equivalence Study Kai Medical Non-Contact Respiratory Rate Monitors Use With Neonates
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test two remote , Doppler radar-based sensor measure monitor respiratory rate . Specifically , clinically stable neonatal patient study aim : 1 . Obtain respiratory effort data neonatal patient remote Doppler radar system modify system clear FDA adult use . 2 . Determine remote Doppler radar system accurately detect respiratory rate neonatal patient , compare standard measurement system . 3 . Determine unattended Doppler radar system , operate 4 hour , accurately detect respiratory rate neonatal patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Clinically stable 1 . Clinically unstable Hypotensive require pressor Intubated 2 . Scheduled plan ( e.g. , CT scan , central line placement ) procedure study period .
